data.message: And I have some really great friends-- and you all know who you are. Luv ya. !!

replies.message: We're glad to hear that, Rebecca. Do you have a favorite experience with your friends? -Sarah

It's just so nice to be able to chat and catch up with everyone on almost a daily basis. We share so many occasions and help each other out in prayers and whatever way we can when times are tough and celebrate with each other when things are going well.  It's been so great catching up with friends who are to far away to see in person but this way we are all still close together thanks FB
